history.narrative: Law 8-47 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-321, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 27, 1989 and July 11, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 1, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 8-80 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
